dcterms:creator: Christophe Demazi`ere
dcterms:description: CORE-SIM was employed to model the induced neutron noise in a Pressurised Water Reactor (PWR) under two scenario settings: Absorber of Variable Strength and Propagating Perturbation in the frequency domain.
dcterms:title: CORE-SIM

dcterms:creator: Gerardo Grandi
Jeffrey A. Borkowsky
Kord S. Smith
dcterms:description: Simulate-3K was utilized to model fuel assemblies cluster vibrations, including fluctuations in thermal-hydraulic parameters between the coolant loops.
dcterms:title: Simulate-3K (S3K)

dcterms:creator: Christophe Demazi`ere
dcterms:description: The CORE-SIM User Manual provides detailed instructions and specifications for using the CORE-SIM neutronic tool.
dcterms:title: CORE-SIM User Manual
